diffuse.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to make heat, light, liquid etc spread through something, or to spread like this
diffuse.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The pollutants diffuse into the soil.
diffuse.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to spread ideas or information among a lot of people, or to spread like this
diffuse.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Their ideas diffused quickly across Europe.
diffuse.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to make a bad feeling or situation less strong or serious
diffuse.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: an attempt to diffuse his anger
diffuse.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The organization is large and diffuse.
diffuse.translation[1].definitions[1].de: using a lot of words and not explaining things clearly and directly
diffuse.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: His writing is diffuse and difficult to understand.
